name: Ice To Meet You (hydrochlorinate)
description:
Created for the Touhou Fan Game Jam 10, Ice To Meet You is a top-down puzzle game, where you have to guide Soko the fairy through a number of illegal ice hockey arenas, created by Cirno of Touhou Project fame.

Actually, what ARE those types of puzzles called? Tile puzzles? There are multiple types of tiles in this game- all of which have different effects.

Can you solve the challenges placed in front of you? Probably, but you won't know for sure unless you try!
